alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Oakland; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:37AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Oakland, Shiawassee, Livingston and Genesee Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 436 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Laingsburg to near Williamston to near Stockbridge. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fowlerville and Gregory around 440 AM EDT. Howell, Pinckney, Perry and Morrice around 445 AM EDT. Owosso, Cohoctah, Byron and Oak Grove around 450 AM EDT. Brighton, Durand, Hamburg, Corunna, Bancroft and Whitmore Lake around 455 AM EDT. Fenton, South Lyon, Linden, Lennon and Lake Fenton around 500 AM EDT. Flushing, Grand Blanc, Milford, Holly and Swartz Creek around 505 AM EDT. Novi, Goodrich, Ortonville and Beecher around 510 AM EDT. Flint, Davison, Burton, Mount Morris, Otisville and Crossroads Village around 515 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Plainfield, Rankin, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Conway Township, Pinckney State Recreation Area, Genesee, White Lake and Chilson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
